title: Gamebreaking lag with 40 ping?
body:
Im not sure what the cause is, i recently moved to a smalltown so im strongarmed into only being able to get Suddenlink.

wired connection, 40 ping.

GAMEBREAKING lag last game, unable to move for up to 5-7 seconds at a time, without my ping ever moving more than 1.

replies.body: i have had the same thing but a bit different it was ever since the warwick update came out hopefully it get fixed thoooo

There may be a few causes of this, like the strength or settings of your network or how your ISP might be routing to our servers.  Since you've moved, I recommend going through each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure everything is configured and connected at your new location.  Let me know if that helps!
